feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-20T19:57:45.185173Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;No-more-secrets：重现 1992 年电影《运动鞋》中的解密效果</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/bartobri/no-more-secrets</id>; <updated>;20 23-07-20T12:57:38.020601Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/bartobri/no-more-secrets"/>; <作者>; <name>;tambourine_man</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tambourine_man</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/68 bbd6c555003c61a5e865edaf317f370a7b35544abb59a85ce179fde58f626f/68747470733a2f2f7777772e627269616e626172746f2e696e666f2f73746174696 32f6e6d732f6e6d732e676966"样式="宽度：220px； height: 125px;" />;<br />;该项目提供了一个名为 nms 的命令行工具，它重现了 1992 年黑客电影 Sneakers 中屏幕上出现的著名数据解密效果。它适用于管道数据，显示加密数据，然后显示原始纯文本字符。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#no-more-secrets-recreate-the-decryption-effect-seen-in-the-1992- movie-sneakers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36799776" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FedNow 已上线</stitle>; <id>;https://www.feder alreserve.gov/newsevents/pressreleases/other20230720a.htm</id>; <更新>;2023-07-20T15:57:38.026175Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/pressreleases/other20230720a.htm"/>; <作者>; <名称>;lavp</名称>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lavp</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.federalreserve.gov/images/social-media/social-default-image-opengraph.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;美联储宣布其新的即时支付系统 FedNow 服务现已上线。该工具允许银行和信用社为客户即时转账，使日常支付更快、更方便。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fednow-is-live" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36801491" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;JPEG XL：如何开始，进展如何</stitle>; <id>;https://cloudinary.com/blog/jpeg-xl-how-it-started-how-its-going</id>; <updated>;2023- 07-20T15:57:38.027449Z</updated>; <link href="https://cloudinary.com/blog/jpeg-xl-how-it-started-how-its-going"/>; <作者>; <name>;ksec</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ksec</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://res.cloudinary.com /cloudinary-marketing/images/w_2000,h_1100/f_auto,q_auto/v1688666201/Blog-jpegXL/Blog-jpegXL-jpg?_i=AA" style="width: 220px; height: 121px;" />;<br />;JPEG XL 开发于 2018 年开始，结合了 Google 和 Cloudinary 的提案。尽管遇到了一些挫折，JPEG XL 已在图像创作软件中得到采用，并且现在得到了 Apple Safari 浏览器的支持。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#jpeg-xl-how-it-started-how-its-going" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36801448" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在 260MB RAM 中运行稳定 Diffusion</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/vitoplantamura/OnnxStream</id>; <已更新>;2023-07-20T17:57:38.028266Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/vitoplantamura/OnnxStream"/>; <作者>; <name>;Robin89</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Robin89</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vitoplant amura/OnnxStream/master/assets/output_W16A16.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;挑战在于在 Raspberry Pi Zero 2（具有 512MB RAM 的微型计算机）上运行 Stable Diffusion，其中包括具有近 10 亿个参数的大型变压器模型，无需添加更多交换空间，也无需在磁盘上卸载中间结果。OnnxStream 是一个超小型且可破解的推理库，专门致力于最大限度地减少内存消耗。它的内存消耗甚至比 OnnxRuntime 少 55 倍，而仅为 0.5 -2 倍慢。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#running-stable-diffusion-in-260mb-of-ram" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36803408" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernew s.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;人体着色器</stitle>; <id>;https:// humanshader.com </id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T16:57:38.029011Z</updated>; <link href="https:// humanshader.com"/>; <author>; <name>;bpierre </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bpierre </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;您将使用 X 和 Y 坐标计算像素的 R、G 和 B 颜色值。不允许使用计算机或计算器，并且您必须提供计算的照片。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/# human-shader" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36779855" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;已禁止虚拟 Minecraft 架构中的新闻业（2022 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://99percentinvisible.org/article/uncensored-library-virtual-minecraft-architecture-houses-banned-journalism/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T15:57:38.029761Z</updated>; <link href="https://99percentinvisible.org/article/ uncensored-library-virtual-minecraft-architecture-houses-banned-journalism/"/>; <作者>; <name>;cratermoon</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cratermoon</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://99percentinvisible.org/app/uploads/2022/02/uncensored-library-fla gs-600x338.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;未经审查的图书馆项目将建筑和新闻学结合在 Minecraft 的虚拟现实空间中。它允许用户阅读和下载在虚拟空间中组织的书籍以供访问。该图书馆旨在绕过审查并向用户提供免费信息。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#banned-journalism-housed-in-virtual-minecraft-architecture-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36802021" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;意外承重</stitle>; <id>;https://www.jefftk.com/p/accidentally-load-bearing</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T13:57:38.030501Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.jefftk.com/p/accidentally-load-bearing"/>; <author>; < name>;jamessun</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jamessun</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;切斯特顿的栅栏的想法是，在更改某些内容之前，我们应该理解为什么要这样设置。如果目的看起来毫无意义，我们可能会忽视它。对复杂系统进行更改时，重要的是要考虑原始设计以及组件可能承担的任何其他角色。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#accidentally-load-bearing" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36800151" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">; Docuseal：开源 DocuSign 替代品。创建、填写、签署数字文档</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/docusealco/docuseal</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T10:57:38.031209Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/docusealco/docuseal"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://github-product-user-asset-6210df.s3.amazonaws.com/5418788/251969508-d8703ea3-361a-423f-8bfe-eff1bd9dbe14.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 117px;" />;<br />;DocuSeal 是一个开源平台，提供安全高效的数字文档签名和处理。创建 PDF 表单，使用易于使用、针对移动设备优化的网络工具在任何设备上在线填写和签名。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#docuseal-open-source-docusign-alternative-create-fill-sign-digital-documents" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36798593" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;微软推出 TypeChat</stitle>; <id>;https://microsoft.github.io/TypeChat/blog/introducing-typechat/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T16:57:38.031921Z</updated>; <link href="https://microsoft.github.io/TypeChat/blog/introducing-typechat/"/>; <author>; <name>;DanRosenwasser</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=DanRosenwasser</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;TypeChat 是 Microsoft 发布的一个实验性库，旨在将大型语言模型集成到现有应用程序界面中。它使用代码库中的类型定义来检索类型安全的结构化 AI 响应。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#introducing-typechat-from-microsoft" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36803124" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题type="text">;变得无法被 Google 搜索</stitle>; <id>;https://joeyh.name/blog/entry/become_ungoogleable/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T14:57:38.032652Z</updated>; <link href="https://joeyh.name/blog/entry/become_ungoogleable/"/>; <author>; <name>;pabs3</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=pabs3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;我已将我的网站从 Google 索引中删除。这是一个独特的时代，在不损失太多的情况下变得无法在谷歌搜索实际上是可行的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#become-ungoogleable" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36800789" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">; Meta 的 Aria 项目“数字孪生”数据集</stitle>; <id>;https://www.projectaria.com/datasets/adt/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T13:57:38.034094Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.projectaria.com/datasets/adt/"/>; <author>; <name>;socratic1</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=socratic1</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#project-aria-digital-twin-dataset-by-meta" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36800041" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </ent ry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;国税局推进新的免费纳税申报系统</stitle>; <id>;https://www.pbs.org/newshour/politics/irs-moves-forward-with-a-new-free-file-tax-return-system-that-has-both-supporters-and-critics-mobilizing</id>; <updated>;202 3-07-20T18:57:38.034766Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.pbs.org/newshour/politics/irs-moves-forward-with-a-new-free-file-tax-return-system-that-has-both-supporters-and-critics-mobilizing"/>; <author>; <name>;DocFeind</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=DocFeind</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://d3i6fh83elv35t.cloudfront.net/static/assets/images/placeholder.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;国税局计划明年测试新的电子免费纳税申报系统，这一想法的支持者和批评者都动员起来影响公众和国会，以决定政府是否应该建立一个永久性计划来帮助人们报税，而无需向其他人支付费用来计算他们所欠的税款。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#irs-moves-forward-with-a-new-free-file-tax-re turn-system" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36804710" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;酷炫复古终端</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/Swordfish90 /cool-retro-term</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T10:57:38.035467Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/Swordfish90/cool-retro-term"/>; <author>; <name>;qazpot</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=qazpot</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/121322/32070717-16708784-ba42-11e7-8572-a8fcc10d7f7d.gif" style="width: 220px; height: 111px;" />;<br />;cool-retro-term 是一个模仿老式阴极管屏幕外观和感觉的终端模拟器。它是可定制的、轻量级的，可在 Linux 和 macOS 上运行。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cool-retro-terminal" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36798774" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;凯文·米特尼克去世</stitle>; <id>;https://www.dignitymemorial.com/obituaries/las-vegas-nv/kevin-mitnick-11371668</id>; <更新>;2023-07-19T 23:57:38.036167Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.dignitymemorial.com/obituaries/las-vegas-nv/kevin-mitnick-11371668"/>; <author>; <name>;thirtyseven</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thirtyseven</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://d3eguztg5751m.cloudfront.net/as/assets-mem-com/cmi/8/6/6/1/11371668/20230719_173037764_0_orig.jpg/-/kevin-mitnick-las-vegas-nv-obituary.jpg?crop=%28171.58333333333331%2 C0%2C544.9583333333333%2C464%29&cropxunits=696&cropyunits=464&maxheight=650" style="宽度：220px;身高：274px;" />;<br />;著名黑客和网络安全专家凯文·米特尼克 (Kevin Mitnick) 在与胰腺癌作斗争后于 59 岁去世。他留下了怀着第一个孩子的妻子金伯利·米特尼克 (Kimberley Mitnick)。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#kevin-mitnick-has-died" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycomb inator.com/item?id=36795173" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;完全断电后冷重启整个系统</stitle>; <id>;https://www.evalapply.org/posts/cold-restart-total-outage/index.html</id>; <updated>;2 023-07-20T13:57:38.036893Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.evalapply.org/posts/cold-restart-total-outage/index.html"/>; <author>; <name>;dmazin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dmazin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;当您的所有系统因数据中心而宕机时爆炸或其他事情发生导致所有花哨的微服务、IAM 等都死了。当埃隆·马斯克开始解雇 Bird 应用程序的员工时，我对这种（原文如此）灾难恢复方法产生了兴趣，每个人都说 Twitter 将瘫痪，并且几乎不可能冷启动它。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cold-restart-whole-system-after-total-outage" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36792421" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;过去不是真的</stitle>; <id>;https://sive.rs/pnt</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T10:57:38.037590Z</updated>; <link href="https://sive.rs/pnt"/>; <author>; <name>;swah</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=swah</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://sive.rs/images/crashedcar.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：149px；" />;<br />;提交人 17 岁时，他们引发了一场车祸，他们认为这场车祸导致另一名司机瘫痪。多年后，他们找到了这名女子并道歉，却发现她从未瘫痪。多年来，两人都因误会而心怀愧疚。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-past-is-not-true" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36798854" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;1961 年，盖洛普民意调查显示，只有 33% 的美国人支持登月</stitle>; <id>;https://newsletter.pessimistsarchive.org/p/the-moon-landing-was-opposed-by-majority</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T18:57:38.038287Z</updated>; <link href="https://newsletter.pessimistsarchive .org/p/the-moon-landing-was-opposed-by-majority"/>; <author>; <name>;headalgorithm</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=headalgorithm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_2400,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive ：steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F42503f30-47ac-4af7-9a27-da9a1913fc9d_7932x5826.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：162px；" />;<br />;1969年登月之前，只有不到三分之一的美国人赞成。现在登月是两党支持的，但当时也有两党反对。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#in-1961-a-gallup-poll-showed-only-33-of-americans-in-favor-of-moon-landing" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36804394" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Azorius 0.1</stitle>; <id>;https://flak.tedunangst.com/post/azorius-01</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T15:57:38.039745Z</updated>; <link href="https://flak.tedunangst.com /post/azorius-01"/>; <author>; <name>;hiena03</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hiena03</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Azorius 是一个联合链接网站，允许用户发布链接并对其发表评论。它旨在提供准确、完整的线程视图，而无需检查远程实例是否有遗漏的回复。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#azorius-0-1" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36801562" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">; ChatGPT 自定义说明</stitle>; <id>;https://openai.com/blog/custom-instructions-for-chatgpt</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T17:57:38.040471Z</updated>; <link href="https://openai.com/blog/custom-instructions-for-chatgpt"/>; <author>; <name>;magoghm</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycom binator.com/user?id=magoghm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.openai.com/blob/71bddfc7-a5ca-4c77-9b3d-96659356640c/custom-instructions-for-chatgpt.png?trim=0%2C0%2C0%2C0" style="width: 220px;高度：220px；” />;<br />;自定义指令允许您添加您希望 ChatGPT 在生成响应时考虑的首选项或要求。该模型每次响应时都会考虑这些指令，因此您不必在每次对话中重复您的偏好或信息。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#custom-instructions-for-chatgpt" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36803744" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;Google 测试能够撰写新闻文章的人工智能工具</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nytimes.com/2023/07/19/business/google-artificial-intelligence-news-articles.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T13:57:38.042204Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.nytimes.com/2023/07 /19/business/google-artificial-intelligence-news-articles.html"/>; <author>; <name>;asnyder</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=asnyder</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2023/07/19/multimedia/19google-ai-vzbq/19google- ai-vzbq-articleLarge.jpg?quality=75&auto=webp&disable=upscale" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;谷歌正在测试一款使用人工智能技术来生成新闻报道的产品。该工具称为 Genesis，可以通过获取有关时事的信息来生成新闻内容。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#google-tests-ai-tool-that-is-able-to-write-news-articles" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36799600" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernew s.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;苹果表示将在英国删除 iMessage 和 FaceTime，而不是破坏加密</stitle>; <id>;https://9to5mac.com/2023/07/20/apple-imessage-facetime-remove-security-law/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T13:57:38.042923Z</updated>; <link href="https://9 to5mac.com/2023/07/20/apple-imessage-facetime-remove-security-law/"/>; <author>; <name>;samwillis</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=samwillis</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://9to5mac.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2022/06/ iMessage-edit-victim.png?w=1600" style="宽度：220px；高度：111px；" />;<br />;苹果表示，它宁愿从英国市场完全删除 iMessage 和 FaceTime 等应用程序，也不愿提供端到端加密后门。英国政府希望能够扫描端到端加密消息，但苹果强烈反对这一要求。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#apple-says-it-ll-remove-imessage-and-facetime-in-uk-rather-than-break-encryption" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36800297" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <ent ry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;83年后终于确定了难以捉摸的一氧化硼的结构</stitle>; <id>;https://phys.org/news/2023-07-elusive-boron-monoxy-years.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T14:57:38.043666Z</update d>; <link href="https://phys.org/news/2023-07-elusive-boron-monoxy-years.html"/>; <author>; <name>;wglb</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=wglb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://scx1.b-cdn.net/csz/news/800a/2023 /struct-of-elusive-b.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：195px；" />;<br />;艾姆斯国家实验室的科学家们确定了一氧化硼的结构，这种化合物 83 年来一直难以捉摸。利用新的核磁共振方法和分析工具，该团队最终解析了这种看似简单的材料的结构。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#struct-of-elusive-boron-monoxy-finally-dependent-after-83-years" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36787794" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MDN Playground</stitle>; <id>;https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/play</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T08:57:38.044371Z</updated>; <link href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/play"/>; <author>; <name>;weinzierl</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=weinzierl</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://developer.mozilla.org/mdn-social-share.cd6c4a5a.png" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;MDN Web 文档站点提供有关开放 Web 技术的信息，包括适用于网站和渐进式 Web 应用程序的 HTML、CSS 和 API。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mdn-playground" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36798157" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;任意类型 – 开源、本地优先、P2P 概念替代</stitle>; <id>;https://anytype.io/?hn</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T12:57:38.045080Z</updated>; <link href="https://anytype.io/?hn"/>; <author>; <name>;TTTZ</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=TTTZ</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://anytype.io/assets/svg/Main.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 167px;" />;<br />;适合那些崇尚信任和自主的人。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#anytype-open-source-local-first-p2p-notion-alternative" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36799548" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.beta cat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;真空飞艇</stitle>; <id>;https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vacuum_airship</id>; <更新>;2023-07-20T09:57:38.046430Z</更新>; <link href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vacuum_airship"/>; <作者>; <name>;游击队</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=guerrilla</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;真空飞艇，也称为真空气球，是一种假想的飞艇，它被抽空，而不是填充比空气轻的气体，例如氢气或氦气。这将是单位体积提升力的最终表达。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#vacuum-airship" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36798395" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Un shackle：绕过Windows和Linux密码登录的工具</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/Fadi002/unshackle</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T10:57:38.047130Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/Fadi002/unshackle"/>; <author>; <name>;AdvDebug</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=AdvDebug</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/cb24ffef3cdc32999c1d3bcd9d442d36ea2450c19a75f10c7c15c593024bcce6/Fadi002/unshackle" style="width: 220px; height: 11 0像素；” />;<br />;Unshackle 是一款开源工具，可从基于 Linux 的可启动 USB 绕过 Windows 和 Linux 用户密码。 （Linux 旁路仍在开发中）该工具仅用于教育目的。请勿将其用于任何非法活动或未经授权的访问。需要您自担风险使用它。我们对其使用造成的任何损害不承担任何责任。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#unshackle-a-tool-to-bypass-windows-and-linux-password-logins" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36798864" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
